728890f-a.text:
Grove Avenue, north side, west from but not including Richmond Avenue. Across the background is visible the Bayonne
Bridge.

September 6, 1936.
P.L. Sperr
728890f-a.folder: Grove Avenue & Richmond Avenue, Staten Island, NY

729355f-a.text:
Richmond Avenue, at and adjoining the N.E. corner
of Vreeland Street.
July 6, 1936
P. L. Sperr
729355f-a.folder: Richmond Avenue & Vreeland Street, Staten Island, NY
